amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) by $126 million and reduces funds for NASA's Cross Agency Support by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) by $126 million, and reduce funds for NASA's Cross Agency Support by $126 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grimm amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 204 (Roll no. 214).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grimm amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 204 (Roll no. 214).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Grimm.
